Verses: 1 ebesu Sabaiyin Thoodhanukku Nee Ezhudhavendiyadhu Ennavenil: Ezhu Natchaththirangalaith Thammudaiya Valadhukaraththil Endhikkondu, Ezhu Pon Kuththuvilakkugalin Maththiyile Ulaavikkondirukkiravar Sollugiradhaavadhu;

2 un Kiriyaigalaiyum, Un Pirayaasaththaiyum, Un Porumaiyaiyum, Nee Pollaadhavargalaich Sagikakkoodaamalirukkiradhaiyum, Apposthalarallaadhavargal Thangalai Apposthalarendru Sollugiradhai Nee Sodhiththu Avargalaip Poiyarendru Kandarindhadhaiyum;
3 nee Sagiththukkondirukkiradhaiyum, Porumaiyaayirukkiradhaiyum, En Naamaththinimiththam Ilaippadaiyaamal Pirayaasappattadhaiyum Arindhirukkiren.
4 aanaalum, Nee Aadhiyil Kondirundha Anbai Vittaai Endru Unperil Enakkuk Kurai Undu.

5 aagaiyaal, Nee Inna Nilaimaiyilirundhu Vizhundhaayenbadhai Ninaiththu, Manandhirumbi, Aadhiyil Seydha Kiriyaigalaich Seyvaayaaga; Illaavittaal Naan Seekkiramaai Unnidaththil Vandhu, Nee Manandhirumbaadhapatchaththil, Un Vilakkuththandai Adhanidaththinindru Neekkividuven.
6 naan Verukkira Nikkolaai Madhastharin Kiriyaigalai Neeyum Verukkiraai, Idhu Unnidaththilundu.

7 aaviyaanavar Sabaigalukkuch Sollugiradhaik Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan; Jeyangollugiravanevano Avanukku Dhevanudaiya Paradheesin Maththiyilirukkira Jeevavirutchaththin Kaniyaip Pusikkakkoduppen Endrezhudhu.
8 simirnaa Sabaiyin Thoodhanukku Nee Ezhudhavendiyadhu Ennavenil: Mundhinavarum Pindhinavarum, Mariththirundhu Pizhaiththavarumaanavar Sollugiradhaavadhu;

9 un Kiriyaigalaiyum, Un Ubaththiravaththaiyum, Nee Aisuvariyamullavanaayirundhum Unakkirukkira Thariththiraththaiyum, Thangalai Yoodharendru Solliyum Yoodharaayiraamal Saaththaanudaiya Koottamaayirukkiravargal Seyyum Thooshanaththaiyum Arindhirukkiren.

10 nee Padappogira Paadugalaikkuriththu Evvalavum Bayappadaadhe; Idho, Neengal Sodhikkappadumporuttaagap Pisaasaanavan Ungalil Silaraik Kaavalil Poduvaan; Paththunaal Ubaththirappaduveergal. Aagilum Nee Maranapariyandham Unmaiyaayiru, Appozhudhu Jeevagireedaththai Unakkuth Tharuven.
11 aaviyaanavar Sabaigalukkuch Sollugiradhaik Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan; Jeyangollugiravan Irandaam Maranaththinaal Sedhappaduvadhillai Endrezhudhu.
12 pergamu Sabaiyin Thoodhanukku Nee Ezhudhavendiyadhu Ennavenil: Irupuramum Karukkulla Pattayaththai Udaiyavar Sollugiradhaavadhu;

13 un Kiriyaigalaiyum, Saaththaanudaiya Singaasanamirukkira Idaththil Nee Kudiyirukkiradhaiyum Nee En Naamaththaip Patrikkondirukkiradhaiyum, Saaththaan Kudikondirukkira Idaththile Ungalukkulle Enakku Unmaiyulla Saatchiyaana Andhippaa Enbavan Kollappatta Naatkalilum Ennaip Patrum Visuvaasaththai Nee Marudhaliyaamalirundhadhaiyum Arindhirukkiren.

14 aagilum, Sila Kaariyangalaikkuriththu Unperil Enakkuk Kurai Undu; Vikkiragangalukkup Padaiththavaigalaip Pusippadharkum Vesiththanampannuvadharkum Edhuvaana Idaralai Isravel Puththirarmunbaagap Podumbadi Baalaak Enbavanukkup Podhanai Seydha Bileyaamudaiya Podhagaththaik Kaikkollugiravargal Unnidaththilundu.
15 appadiye Nikkolaai Madhastharudaiya Podhagaththaik Kaikkollugiravargalum Unnidaththilundu; Adhai Naan Verukkiren.
16 nee Manandhirumpu, Illaavittaal Naan Seekkiramaai Unnidaththil Vandhu, En Vaayin Pattayaththaal Avargalode Yuththampannuven.

17 aaviyaanavar Sabaigalukkuch Sollugiradhaik Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan; Jeyangollugiravanukku Naan Maraivaana Mannaavaip Pusikkakkoduththu, Avanukku Venmaiyaana Kurikkallaiyum, Andhak Kallinmel Ezhudhappattadhum Adhaip Perugiravaneyandri Veroruvanum Ariyakkoodaadhadhumaagiya Pudhiya Naamaththaiyum Koduppen Endrezhudhu.
18 thiyaththeeraa Sabaiyin Thoodhanukku Nee Ezhudhavendiyadhu Ennavenil: Akkinijuvaalai Pondra Kangalum, Piragaasamaana Vengalampondra Paadhangalumulla Dhevakumaaran Sollugiradhaavadhu;
19 un Kiriyaigalaiyum Un Anbaiyum, Un Oozhiyaththaiyum, Un Visuvaasaththaiyum, Un Porumaiyaiyum, Nee Munbu Seydha Kiriyaigalilum Pinbuseydha Kiriyaigal Adhigamaayirukkiradhaiyum Arindhirukkiren.

20 aagilum, Unperil Enakkuk Kurai Undu; Ennavenil, Thannaith Theerkkadharisiyendru Sollugira Yesabel Ennum Sthireeyaanaval Ennudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Vesiththanampannavum Vikkiragangalukkup Padaiththavaigalaip Pusikkavum Avargalukkup Podhiththu, Avargalai Vanjikkumbadi Nee Avalukku Idangodukkiraai.
21 aval Manandhirumbumpadiyaai Avalukkuth Thavanaikoduththen; Than Vesimaarkththai Vittu Manandhirumba Avalukku Viruppamillai.
22 idho, Naan Avalaik Kattilkidaiyaakki, Avaludane Vibasaaranjeydhavargal Thangaludaiya Kiriyaigalaivittu Manandhirumbaavittaal Avargalaiyum Migundha Ubaththiravaththile Thalli,

23 avaludaiya Pillaigalaiyum Kollave Kolluven; Appozhudhu Naane Ullindhiriyangalaiyum Irudhayangalaiyum Aaraaigiravarendru Ellaach Sabaigalum Arindhukollum; Andriyum Ungalil Ovvoruvanukkum Ungal Kiriyaigalinpadiye Balanalippen.

24 thiyaththeeraavile Indhap Podhagaththaip Patrikkollaamalum, Saaththaanudaiya Aazhangal Endru Avargal Sollugiraargale, Andha Aazhangalai Arindhukollaamalumirukkira Matravargalaagiya Ungalukku Naan Solgiradhaavadhu, Ungalmel Veroru Paaraththaiyum Sumaththamaatten.
25 ungalukkulladhai Naan Varumalavum Patrikkondirungal.
26 jeyangondu Mudivupariyandham En Kiriyaigalaik Kaikkollugiravanevano Avanukku, Naan En Pidhaavinidaththil Adhigaaram Petradhupola, Jaadhigalmel Adhigaaram Koduppen.
27 avan Iruppukkolaal Avargalai Aaluvaan; Avargal Manbaandangalaippola Norukkappaduvaargal.
28 vidivelli Natchaththiraththaiyum Avanukkuk Koduppen
29 aaviyaanavar Sabaigalukkuch Sollugiradhaik Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan Endrezhudhu.
